title: Andrew Jones – 2016 Speech on Funding for Road Maintenance
author: admin
summary: Below is the text of the speech made by Andrew Jones, the Parliamentary Under Secretary of State for Transport, at the Road Surface Treatments Association Conference on 7 April 2016.
